item.title: ‘My Life With the Walter Boys’ Season 2 Debuts With 11.8 Million Views on Netflix
item.description: Season 2 of “My Life With the Walter Boys” reached 11.8 million views in its first four days of availability on Netflix, debuting as the No. 1 series on Netflix for the week of Aug. 25-31.
